news_header: Miikka Seppälä steps down as CEO of Särkänniemi after 14 years to take on a new role with the City of Tampere, focusing on experience economy companies.
news_text: Miikka Seppälä, who has been the Managing Director of Särkänniemi for 14 years, is transitioning to a new role with the City of Tampere as owner-manager of experience economy companies. His responsibilities will include enhancing corporate governance in the fields of leisure, tourism, and experience economy, as well as strategic cooperation on major development projects. Seppälä, who holds a Master's degree in economics, believes it is the right time to pass on his role to a successor. He reflects on his greatest achievement as a project plan, despite some challenges faced during his tenure, including the controversial transfer of dolphins to Greece. The search for his successor has already begun, with the new CEO expected to be named in the spring.
